message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a truly valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's quality and rarity.

I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's quality and rarity, and I'm willing to make a serious offer for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $18000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the time I've invested in it. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm not willing to compromise on the price too much.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $18000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $15000. I'm confident that's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at that price.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $15000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $16500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations we've had so far. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to compromise on the price too much.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, $16500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to make one more serious offer. I'll meet you at $14000. I think this is a fair price considering the negotiations we've had so far, and I'm willing to make a commitment to purchase the product at this price.
